data.name: Glider Sim
data.description:
Welcome to Glider Sim, a professional paragliding/paramotor simulator aimed at achieving the realism of the actual sport! Ride thermals up to the clouds alongside soaring eagles, or rush down steep cliffs in the speed wing. Jump into multiplayer and experience the sensation of free flight with your friends! 
 
The sim contains 3 of the biggest open world maps ever created for the Meta Quest: Sun Valley, ID, USA; Walenstadt Switzerland (Swiss Alps) and the Grand Teton Mountains, USA. Scenery is derived from real world satellite imagery and overlaid with high resolution textures and dense vegetation. Each map is approx. 50 km2. 

Attention went into flight physics, wind and thermal systems. Choose your launch point, glider, and weather condition. Use your VR controllers to grab the handles and lean forward to takeoff! Find ridge lift and thermals to stay airborne. You can toggle on and off wind visualization particles. Use the in-game Map/GPS to track your flight across the map.

Each cell of the glider is simulated and physics applied. You can do maneuvers such as wingovers, spirals, stalls, and swoops. Watch out and don't let your wing collapse!

Fly the scored challenges that help improve your flying and understand the basics of paragliding. 

Be sure to share and rate if you enjoy so we can continue development!

(Important Note: Quest 1 users will no longer receive updates and Quest 1 multiplayer will no longer work after Jan 1, 2024)

changelog.change_log: Add two more speed wing challenges to Sun Valley. Add in protoype XC Race challenge to Swiss Alps. Improve Speedwing flight physics. Various Bug Fixes.
Add scored speed challenges to each map. Update UI. Improve Performance.
Make Platforms Wider. Now can reposition launch point anywhere. Now can launch glider at landing spot.
Perfromance Improvments. Ability to start with wing deflated. UI updates.
New Tetons Mountains Map!, add depth buffer to reduces flickering water, add Experimental Graphics options, Update to Multiplayer 1.4.
Update to Multiplayer 1.3 so you can play with Steam users.

Fix thermal sync over multiplayer. Improve multiplayer performance by limiting client glider visual details at far distances. Reduce paramator motor volume. Increase the clipping plane so doesn't cut off distant terrain.
Print Error Messages at Login Screen. Please Report if you can not get past the home screen! Increase graphics a little for Quest 2 headsets.

Add Ski Lift to Swiss Alps Map. Fix map Icons not aligning to terrain on Swiss Map. Fix issue with controls not being shown. Remap the speed bar bindings to left controller Y X button presses. Rotate camera now binded to right thumbstick VR controller. Add 10 more launch points to Swiss Alps map.
Big Update! Add Multiplayer. Add new map Swiss Alps. Improved Physics. Improved Sun Valley, ID Scenery. Add many more launch points. In-Game 2D Map. Many More updates.

-Update Character Model Handle Grip. 
-Update Character Scale and Model.
-Update Thermal Visulization
"-Add in reduce motion sickness options and improve smoothness in first person mode"
